mkr.ant.types
Class FilterSet<P>

java.lang.Object
  org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntRef<T>
      org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntElement<org.apache.tools.ant.types.FilterSet,P>
          mkr.ant.types.FilterSet<P>

public class FilterSet<P>
extends AntElement<org.apache.tools.ant.types.FilterSet,P>

A set of filters to be applied to something. A filter set may have begintoken and endtokens defined.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.types.FilterSet)

setRefid

public FilterSet<P> setRefid(org.apache.tools.ant.types.Reference val)
Set the value of the refid attribute.

Subclasses may need to check whether any other attributes have been set as well or child elements have been created and thus override this method. if they do the must call super.setRefid.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.types.DataType.setRefid)
